name: CheckiO plugin for PyCharm Edu
body:
#  Welcome to CheckiO PyCharm Plugin
CheckiO PyCharm Plugin is a plugin for [PyCharm Edu] (https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm-edu/)  to solve missions from [CheckIO] (http://www.checkio.org/). 

## Features

### Special CheckIO project in PyCharm Edu 
Create CheckiO project type in PyCharm Edu to start playing.

![](https://github.com/evgraph/CheckIOPyCharmPlugin/blob/master/images/new_project.png?raw=true)

### Available missions grouped by stations in Project view

All missions like in CheckiO are grouped by stations and you can see its solve and publication status.

![](https://github.com/evgraph/CheckIOPyCharmPlugin/blob/master/images/project_view.png?raw=true)

### Mission text panel with action toolbar

Mission's text and related actions are placed on Task Info tool window. You can open links from missions's text in internal browser.

![](https://github.com/evgraph/CheckIOPyCharmPlugin/blob/gh-pages/images/task_panel.png?raw=true)

### User info panel
See your progress on user info panel.

![](https://github.com/evgraph/CheckIOPyCharmPlugin/blob/gh-pages/images/user_info.png?raw=true)

### Solution checking
To check mission you can run solution locally and then it's sent to the CheckiO for testing. 

![](https://github.com/evgraph/CheckIOPyCharmPlugin/blob/gh-pages/images/check.png?raw=true)


### Publications

For solved task you can see other's solutions grouped by categories. Solution file is opened in local editor, so you can run it.

![](https://github.com/evgraph/CheckIOPyCharmPlugin/blob/gh-pages/images/solutions.png?raw=true)

### Hints
Like in CheckiO if you need help you can ask for it. Click on a bulb and hint appears.

![](https://github.com/evgraph/CheckIOPyCharmPlugin/blob/gh-pages/images/hints.png?raw=true)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
